Data Structures

struct  DateAndTime

Detailed Description

RealTimeClock is the APOXI device abstraction interface for RTC hardware driver.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum RealTimeClock::RtcInfo
 

This enumeration type is used as info parameter for RtcInfoMsg.

Enumerator:
DataNotValid 
TimeChanged  RTC data are not valid.
DateChanged  The RTC time has changed.
MinuteTick  The RTC date has changed.
AlarmReached  An alarm has been reached.

DateTime RealTimeClock::GetSecureDateTime (   )  [static]
 

The secure clock can not be changed by the user and is used e.g. for Digital Rights Management.

Returns:
DateTime object of secure clock.

BOOLEAN RealTimeClock::IsRTCStartUpEvent (   )  [static]
 

BOOLEAN RealTimeClock::IsSecureClockValid (   )  [static]
 

Returns:
Status of secure clock. FALSE e.g. if hardware indicates a power failure.
